title: Senior MLOps Engineer
summary: Highly accomplished Senior MLOps Engineer with 8+ years of experience designing, building, and deploying scalable machine learning systems in production. Proven expertise in cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, and MLOps tools like Kubeflow and MLflow. Passionate about automating ML workflows, ensuring model reliability, and driving data-driven innovation.

description: Led the design and implementation of MLOps platforms on AWS, enhancing model deployment efficiency by 40% and reducing inference latency.
Developed and managed scalable CI/CD pipelines for machine learning models using GitLab CI, Docker, and Kubernetes.
Implemented robust monitoring and alerting systems for production ML models with Prometheus and Grafana, ensuring high availability and performance.
Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to standardize ML model lifecycle, from experimentation to production deployment using MLflow and Kubeflow.
Pioneered the adoption of infrastructure-as-code (Terraform) for ML infrastructure, improving provisioning speed and consistency.
Built and maintained automated data pipelines for ML training and inference using Apache Airflow and Spark on Azure.
Developed Dockerized microservices for ML model serving, integrating with REST APIs for real-time predictions.
Contributed to the development of custom MLOps tools for model versioning and artifact management.
Optimized existing ML model serving infrastructure, resulting in a 25% cost reduction and improved scalability.
Designed and implemented ETL processes for large datasets using Python and SQL.
Developed backend services for data ingestion and processing, supporting analytical applications.
Assisted in the deployment and monitoring of initial machine learning prototypes.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering
